title: Microsoft keeps shoving windows 10 in my way, saying it's for my own good.
body:
1. people who didn't turn off windows update got windows 10 installed, but ofc they can't use it without buying a key.
2. people who got the fucking icon, can't get read of it unless they actually understand computers well enough to delete the fucking thing.

no one tired to bring their ass to court over this shit?, sure they are to rich to give a rats ass about anything at this point. but this aggressive marketing is sick!

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/243/316/63e.png
